item.title: Mother Puts Her Toddler in the Trash!
item.description: Authorities respond after a mother allegedly placed her toddler in a trash bin, reviewing the investigation and child welfare response.

media:content.media:title: Mother Puts Her Toddler in the Trash!
media:content.media:description: Authorities respond after a mother allegedly placed her toddler in a trash bin, reviewing the investigation and child welfare response.

item.title: She was just 15. Missing for months.
item.description: The story of a 15-year-old who disappeared, the investigation that followed, and the dedication of those who refused to give up.

item.title: The Tragic Ending of 17-Year-Old Michele Avila
item.description: Exploring the life and tragic death of Michele Avila, a 17-year-old whose case drew national attention and reflection.

item.title: Affairs Of The Heart Turned To Obsession
item.description: A look at how a romantic relationship spiraled into obsession, revealing the warning signs and consequences of unhealthy attachment.

item.title: Kirsten Costas: Cheerleader Offed By Jealous Classmate
item.description: A factual look at the tragic case of Kirsten Costas and how jealousy among classmates led to a devastating outcome.

item.title: When A Toxic Best Friend Crosses A Line
item.description: Exploring what happens when a best friend takes things too far

item.title: Teen Beaten and Left to Die in the Cold
item.description: A respectful look at the investigation into a teen who was attacked and left in the cold, as authorities work to uncover what happened.

item.title: Her Killer’s Name Found Written on Her Body
item.description: A factual account of a case where investigators discovered the suspect’s name left at the crime scene, highlighting the investigative process.

item.title: ‘I Think I Almost Got Kidnapped’: The April Millsap Case
item.description: A Michigan teen’s text message signalled danger moments before her abduction and murder. Her case was solved thanks to phone data and boot-print evidence.

item.title: Mother Smothered Kids to Punish Ex? Fiona Donnison Case
item.description: Examining how Fiona Donnison smothered her two young children as a revenge act against their father, and was sentenced to life in prison.

item.title: Judge Says DOJ Broke Rules in Luigi Mangione Case!
item.description: A federal judge finds that the United States Department of Justice likely violated court rules by making public statements about Luigi Mangione, who faces federal murder and terrorism charges.

item.title: Cheerleader Killed a Week Before Graduation
item.description: A high school cheerleader lost her life in a tragic crash just days before commencement. The school and community now mourn her loss and seek answers

item.title: Kelly Bullwinkle: When Friendship Takes an Unexpected Turn
item.description: Examining how circumstances shifted a meaningful friendship in Kelly Bullwinkle’s life.

item.title: Becky Stowe The Disappearance and an Unexpected Suspect!
item.description: A look into the case surrounding Becky Stowe’s disappearance and the surprising developments in the investigation.

item.title: The Inspiring Story of Jennifer Morey's Survival
item.description: The journey of Jennifer Morey and how she overcame life-threatening challenges with resilience and courage.

item.title: Good Girls Betrayed by People They Trusted
item.description: Examining cases where people were betrayed by those close to them, and how they coped with the aftermath.

item.title: She Stabbed Her Friend and Laughed!
item.description: Exploring the events behind a violent altercation between two friends and the investigation that followed.

item.title: He Buried His Wife’s Head in Their Basement!
item.description: A closer look at a tragic case involving a husband accused of murder and the investigation that revealed the truth.

item.title: Teen Couple Tragically Ended by Masked Stranger!
item.description: Authorities uncover new details in a case involving a teen couple and a masked assailant. A closer look at what investigators found.

item.title: Did Sleepwalking Lead to His Wife's Death?!
item.description: Exploring a puzzling case where sleepwalking may have played a role, this video examines the events and questions surrounding the incident.
